rows.label: tlk45100152_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Emperor Nefer always has this Blade
called Wadatsumi by his side.

rows.label: tlk45100152_02_msg0002
rows.name:
He always looks so cool and
collected, no matter what
happens. He's the best!

rows.label: tlk45100152_02_msg0003
rows.name:
He's gotta be the greatest Blade
in all of Superbia, right?

rows.label: tlk45100152_02_msg0004
rows.name:
No, hang on... Wasn't it
Kagutsuchi-sama that's the
strongest in all of Superbia...?

rows.label: tlk45100152_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, whatever! The two of them
should have a fight to settle it
once and for all. I'd pay to see that!
